text: Romário de Paula Ribeiro (born 6 September 1989) is a Brazilian football player who plays for Casa Pia. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Primeira Liga for Belenenses on 3 April 2010 as a late substitute in a 0–0 draw against Paços de Ferreira. In his second, and, to date, last Primeira Liga game on 8 May 2010, he scored a goal in a 2–1 victory over Vitória de Setúbal. ==References== ==External links== Category:1989 births Category:Sportspeople from Minas Gerais Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:C.F. title: Romário Ribeiro
